problem.markdown:
>>An anti-funicular form is designed to resist what type of force:<<
( ) Tension (x) Compression ( ) Shear ( ) Lateral
[Explanation] Anti-funicular forms are designed to resist compression. [Explanation]
problem.p: An anti-funicular form is designed to resist what type of force:

choicegroup.label: An anti-funicular form is designed to resist what type of force:

div.p: Anti-funicular forms are designed to resist compression.
